alert.note: Alert for Central Interior; Dalton Highway Summits; South Slopes Of The Central Brooks Range; White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 09 at 3:43AM AKST until November 09 at 1:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...South Slopes Of The Central Brooks Range, Dalton Highway Summits, White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River and Central Interior. * WHEN...Until 1 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Interior; Dalton Highway Summits; South Slopes Of The Central Brooks Range; White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River
